page.title: 07Mr Plummer's Farms
page.content: Ricky Miller and David Johnson went to Mr Plummer's farm and we interviewed him. We asked Mr Plummer some questions. In the fields there is oil seed rape and it is used for vegetable oil. Mr Plummer has 500{cows,}and he grows grass, wheat and barley. Then we asked "What do you feed the cows in winter?" He said "Cow cake." Mr Plummer's biggest field is 250 acres. Mr Plummer's tractors have cabs. Mr Plummer has some ducks on his farm and he said the{milking}takes two hours. In the morning Mr Plummer has to get up at 4:00 and in the afternoon he milks at 5:00, and he milks 50 cows an hour. He has got three people on his farm. He has got two farms,{Manor Farm and{Leaze Farm.
